Do you believe in World Cup superstition?

Posted on June 24, 2014

If you believe in supernatural causality, you will love what the numbers of the World Cup have to say which team is going to win this Cup in Brazil. According to this numerology approach neither Brazil nor Germany or Netherlands will be the winner, but Uruguay. The table below shows my reason. This was produced using the googleVis Package.
